title: Barefoot Venus Moisturizing Shea Butter Shower Gel & Body Lotion Set (Lemon Freckle)
features: SHEA BUTTER SHOWER GEL: A mild shower gel that cleanses your skin, without drying it out and leaves it nicely scented with a seductively rich lather, all over your body. Infused with loving extracts of White Pine Bark, Green Tea, Ginseng, and Bearberry
SHEA BUTTER LOTION: Made with super-hydrating shea butter and rejuvenating olive fruit oil and nurturing rice bran oil to hug your skin in silky softness
Free of Parabens, Propylene Glycol, Synthetic Colour and Mineral Oils
Bundle includes 1 of the Shea Butter Shower Gel 175ml and 1 of the Shea Butter Body Lotion 150ml
description: A must have bundle and body care gift set for her featuring our best selling fragrance with creamy vanilla cake and warm buttery notes kissed with lemon optimism.
Lemon Freckle: Shea Butter Shower Gel

This mild plant-derived wash creates a rich, luxurious lather that cleans without stripping or drying. Packed with skin loving extracts of White Pine Bark, Green Tea, Ginseng, Bearberry and Licorice, skin is left silky soft.

Bid dry, moisture stripped skin a fond farewell as super-hydrating shea butter, rejuvenating olive fruit oil and nurturing rice bran to oil hug your skin in silky softness. Packed with uplifting fragrance and quick absorbing moisturizers both skin and senses are left in high spirits.
